Defense Secretary Austin is hospitalized with bladder issue, transfers powers to his deputy  —  Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin was hospitalized again Sunday to address a bladder issue as he continues to recover from prostate cancer and has transferred authorities to his deputy, the Pentagon said.
